column1: #Text=Lieutenant Jee says : " Looks like your uncle was right about the storm after all . "
#Text=The way you talk to everyone around here , from your hard - working crew to your esteemed uncle , shows you know nothing about respect !
#Text=You do n't care about anyone but yourself !
#Text=Then again , what should I expect from a spoiled prince ?
#Text=We 're all a bit tired from being at sea so long .
#Text=I 'm sure after a bowl of noodles , everyone will feel much better .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I do n't need your help keeping order on my ship .
